Content.Title: Theme
Text: The theme in this game jam was "DESPERATE DISEASES REQUIRE DANGEROUS REMEDIES".

Content.Title: Maze of Disease

Images.Alt: Image of the maze in game

Text: I used the theme to come up with our game maze of disease. It's a game were you are either a pill trying to kill all the virsues in the host or a virus trying to infect or destory the host.

Images.Alt: Gif of highlight of our game. (To come...)
